footer.followUs: Follow us on our social media!

hero.text: We are a leading Colombian company in the distribution, service and development of new technologies with a single objective, to safeguard your assets to increase the profitability of your operation; for the Oil & Gas (Upstream, Midstream, Downstream), Energy, Petrochemical, Naval and Industrial markets.

title.text: How can we support you in Royal Integrity?

whatwedo.description: At Royal Integrity we are ready to support you with specialized solutions for the protection of your assets. We offer Volatile Corrosion Inhibitors, PIG services (cleaning, instrumentation and plugs), as well as Carbon Fiber Composite Wrap repair. Contact us and we will gladly help you strengthen the integrity of your systems.

slideOne.text: Our mission is to protect the critical infrastructure and long-term investments of clients in the Oil & Gas, Energy, and Industrial sectors in Latin America. We also offer specialized solutions for corrosion protection and repair.

slideTwo.text: Extending the lifespan of equipment and improving its profitability through direct distribution, expert service, certified training, and support, we provide proven and cutting-edge technologies with unparalleled technical support, acting as partners to secure your assets and optimize your processes.

slideThree.title: Vision
slideThree.text: We envision ourselves as the global benchmark partner in integrity management throughout the asset lifecycle and corrosion protection.

slides.title: Patents, Licensing
slides.text: Versatile Jacketed Cleaning Pig capable of use in pipelines with different fluid phases and ease of negotiation with two or more internal diameters, meeting the particularities of the subsea pipeline system and its arrangement.

slides.title: Foam Pigs
slides.text: Versatile (Low Weight and High Flexibility), ideal for large diameter reductions and sharp angles.

slides.title: Mandrel Pigs
slides.text: Versatile (allowing quick replacement of its components), ideal for line preparation prior to inspection. LBD Model (Bi-Directional), LUN Model (Uni-Directional).

slides.title: Pig Accessories
slides.text: Essential elements that complement and optimize pig performance in cleaning, dehydration, and inspection tasks. Manufactured with high-resistance materials, they allow customizing pigs according to the pipeline's operational conditions. These accessories ensure greater efficiency, adaptability, and lifespan of the equipment in the field.

slides.title: HFlex Pigs
slides.text: Removal of liquids and condensates from gas lines, product separation, cleaning, product interfacing, water removal in hydrostatic testing with minimal risk of obstruction.

slides.title: Discflex Pig
slides.text: Monolithic pigs, with changes in their chemical compositions that allow their applicability in various situations.

slides.title: Valve Pig
slides.text: Monolithic pigs, with changes in their chemical compositions that allow their applicability in various situations.

slides.title: Pig Accessories
slides.text: Essential elements that complement and optimize pig performance in cleaning, dehydration, and inspection tasks. Manufactured with high-resistance materials, they allow customizing pigs according to the pipeline's operational conditions. These accessories ensure greater efficiency, adaptability, and lifespan of the equipment in the field.

slides.title: Hi Pressure Plug
slides.text: Sealing device, with double compression packers (Polyurethane + Tungsten Rings), designed for the temporary plugging of wells for up to 30 years, coated and with sacrificial anodes.

slides.title: Pig Plug
slides.text: Insertion device at one end of the pipeline, creating a seal (Polyurethane Packers are Compressed and Expanded) using a torque tool, blocking the flow and allowing Pig launching.

slides.title: Temp. Flow Blockers
slides.text: Device for directing or diverting Pig flow towards specific pipelines, allowing maintenance and inspection operations to be carried out efficiently and safely, controlled via a lever.

slides.title: Argus Valve
slides.text: Bi-directional valves that allow launching and receiving Pigs in Gas Lines, offering greater efficiency, safety, comfort, ease of use, and reduced environmental impact.

slides.title: Pig Data Logger
slides.text: Economical and Compact ILI Unit (Installed in a Pig) and independent, designed to record pressure, temperature, and speeds via sensors.

slides.title: ILI – Unpiggable Lines
slides.text: ILI Unit for Unpiggable Lines equipped with ultrasonic sensors to measure geometry and detect anomalies in pressurized pipelines.

slides.title: Acquarius
slides.text: Wireless intelligent PIG, equipped with ultrasonic sensors to measure geometry and detect anomalies in pressurized pipelines.

hero.text: Learn more about this company that helps you digitally transform your business.

imageTwo.text: We are based on scientific physics

imageFour.text: Our name “royalIntegrity” pays tribute to the indigenous Santandereana tribe

imageSix.text: Academy with industry and humans with machines

ourTeam.textOne: Highly trained and diverse with profiles with extensive training in natural sciences, physics, mathematics, engineering, design and advanced technology.
ourTeam.textThree: They focus on developing, programming and designing solutions that drive the growth of our clients and the ecosystem.

ourPath.text: We are recognized as a leader in Industry 4.0, providing innovative and technologically advanced solutions to solve the most complex challenges.
